tColorSelect

TYPE tColorSelect RECORD <anonymous wc_color R2>
    
field STRING
showFocus BOOLEAN
doc RECORD <anonymous wc_color R1>
    
color STRING
flat BOOLEAN
showInput BOOLEAN
showPalette BOOLEAN
preferredFormat STRING
showButtons BOOLEAN
chooseText STRING
cancelText STRING

END RECORD

Functions

Create

FUNCTION Create(p_field STRING) RETURNS tColorSelect

Creates a new instance of Color

 define r_acc wc_color.tColorSelect
 call wc_color.Create("formonly.p_color") returning r_color.*

Parameters:
p_field - Form name of the field
Returns:
Color record

Domain

FUNCTION Domain(p_domain STRING) RETURNS DYNAMIC ARRAY OF STRING

Returns list of possible values in a domain

 define a_list dynamic array of string
 call wc_color.Domain("format") returning a_list

Parameters:
p_domain - Domain to return possible values of

Palette

FUNCTION Palette(r_color tColorSelect, p_set STRING)

Set Palette to a preconfgured set of colors

 define r_color tColorSelect
 call wc_color.Palette(r_color.*, "default")

Parameters:
r_color - tColorSelect
p_set - Palette set

Row_Set

FUNCTION Row_Set(p_json STRING) RETURNS tRow

Set tRow of data from JSONArray string

 define p_json string, o_row tRow
 call wc_color.Row_Set('["#FF0","#0F0","#00F"]') returning o_row

Parameters:
p_json - JSON array of strings

Serialize

FUNCTION Serialize(r_color tColorSelect) RETURNS STRING

Serialize a color

 define r_color wc_color.tColorSelect,
   p_json string
 let p_json = wc_color.Serialize(r_color.*)

Parameters:
r_color - tColorSelect
Returns:
JSON string of tColorSelect structure

Set

FUNCTION Set(r_color tColorSelect)

Set initial contents of widget

 define r_color tColorSelect
 let r_color.color = "#F0A0B0"
 ...
 call wc_color.Set(r_color.*)

Parameters:
r_color - Color instance
